resources.string: Please note: If an expense is under multiple tags then the expense will be counted under first tag in which it is associated. Eg say if pizza is tagged under food and party then it will be displayed under food section only.
These expenses will not be automatically added, this will popup as a notification for you to review or discard.
Expendio - An Expense management app powered by just dictating your expenses. Thriwin Solutions
No email app available. Please manually send mail to muralidharan.nandhakumar@gmail.com
Please input a day from 1-28. If not it will be defaulted to day 1. If start day is changed in between an expense month, it will affect all entries after this change.
Please input value from 0 - 23, If not it will be defaulted to 8 PM i.e. 20 hrs
Reset of all your expenses, tags and recurring expenses.
Do you want expendio to remind you for filling any expenses?
Do you want to enable SMS based expense suggestion
All sms phrases and preferences saved successfully
Please update sms phrases in such a way to uniquely identify your sms from your bank. These phrases will be used as hint to identify and help find your expenses from messages.
SMS based expense suggestion will not work if you don\'t provide permission.

Please follow the instruction when you set the sms phrases.

 1. Use phrases from your bank smses to uniquely identify the message 

 2. You can use comma separated values to define sms phrases, so that only if all phrases matches it will be considered for processing
Bluetooth permission required to share data.

SMS sharing is done using your basic SMS capability of your mobile. This action would incur mobile carrier charges. \n\nFor successful acceptance of expenses, it is necessary that recipient also configured your mobile number.
This option uses bluetooth to share your expense information. This works when both the device is in proximity. You should manually pair with other device once
Sms scheduled to be sent, check outbox. Recipient should have configured your number to receive the expenses in Expendio.
sending SMS failed. Please try later.
Please note: You can only edit your expenses, hence shared expenses is not editable here
Please note: You can only edit your expenses, hence shared expenses is not editable here
The expense limit is an indicative figure to let you know whether your are within the limit or exceeded the limt.
Paste your expense report from spreadsheet and click on the restore button above
Paste the expense with the headers.
Processed %s expenses. Do you wish to restore these expenses? \nThis action will remove any expenses for that month found locally!!!.
Removal of expenses is an undoable action. Do you want continue?
Touch here to review the expenses
No/poor internet connection. You need internet connection for speech to text
No/poor internet connection. You need internet connection for syncing data to google
Shared expenses cannot be removed day-wise. \nFor complete removal of shared expenses use option in side menu.
Sync failure.. Please allow some cool off period before trying next time. This could be because of overload on google cloud APIs
Restoring from google failed. Please try again...
Successfully restored settings information from google.
Google account setup failed... Please try again...
All expenses in your phone is backed up successfully...
Backing to Google failed... Please try again later...
Restoring expenses failed... Please try again later...
I\'m the primary user of this account
I share a common Google account with the below mentioned user and I identify myself with below name. So that my expense will be automatically synced to primary user\'s phone and vice versa
Please enter your name and primary account holder name.
Updated successfully & sync with google server started
Silence your Google sync notification of the expenses.
